message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it at $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly below its value.  I could consider letting it go for $15,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for this product. I hope we can find common ground.
